Room.Name: The Shrine of Honesty
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the sacred Etolian Druid's Shrine of Honesty.
Room.LongDescription: You have come upon the sacred Shrine of Honesty. The druids honor six basic virtues, and have built up a shrine for each of them. This one signifies honesty and the importance of honesty in the daily dealings of life. Without honesty, the world would be thrust into chaos and honor would have no value.
